name: ASPasswordCredentialIdentity
desc: A description that uniquely identifies a particular credential.

items.name: init(serviceIdentifier: ASCredentialServiceIdentifier, user: String, recordIdentifier: String?)
class ASCredentialServiceIdentifier
items.desc: An identifier representing a particular service for which the user needs a credential, like a web site.

items.name: var rank: Int
items.desc: An indicator that enables you to prioritze credential identities relative to each other.

items.name: var user: String
items.desc: The username associated with the credential.

items.name: var recordIdentifier: String?
items.desc: A string used to correlate this identity to a record in your appâ€™s own database.

items.name: var serviceIdentifier: ASCredentialServiceIdentifier
items.desc: An identifier that helps the system know with which apps or websites to associate this credential.
